title: Stuffed Shells with Meat Sauce
description: Jumbo pasta shells stuffed with ricotta, spinach (optional), and mozzarella, topped with a hearty meat sauce made from ground beef or turkey.
side: Side: Fresh garlic bread and a simple side salad with Italian dressing.
protein: Protein: Ground beef/turkey in the meat sauce.

title: Chicken Quesadillas
description: Soft flour tortillas filled with rotisserie chicken, cheese, and veggies. Serve with sour cream, guacamole, or salsa.

title: Sloppy Joes
description: A family favorite with ground beef or turkey in a savory sauce, served on a bun.
side: Side: Baked sweet potato fries or a side salad.

title: Veggie Stir-Fry with Tofu/Chicken
description: A colorful stir-fry with tofu, bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, and snap peas. Toss in a soy-based sauce.
protein: Protein: Tofu (or chicken for non-vegetarian option).

title: Fish Tacos (or Shrimp)
description: Crispy or grilled fish fillets (like cod) with shredded cabbage, pico de gallo, and a creamy sauce.
side: Side: Cilantro-lime rice and black beans.

title: Homemade Burgers with Baked Fries
description: Grilled beef or turkey burgers with all the fixings (cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles).
side: Side: Baked fries or a side salad.

title: Beef Bottom Round Roast and Veggie Slow Cooker
description: Roast whole chicken with carrots, potatoes, and onions, seasoned with herbs.
side: Side: A fresh green salad or roasted Brussels sprouts.
